StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetContactCardByID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContactCardId uniqueiden..er AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT CC.ContactCardId, CC.Title, CC.ContactFName, CC.ContactMName, CC.ContactLName, CC.Nickname, CC.DatePrepared, CC.FaxNumber, CC.email, CC.VoiceMail, CC.CellPhone, CC.FamilyInfo, CC.Needs, CC.DirectSupport, CC.USMC, CC.Rank, CC.Other, CC.SupportValue, CC.ReferalLName, CC.ReferalFName, CC.ReferalMName, CC.ReferalSSN, CC.Ac.onDate, CC.Results, CC.Hobbies, CC.Organiza.on_Id, CC.FiscalYear, B.ID BusID, B.Street1 BusStreet1, B.Street2 BusStreet2, B.City BusCity, B.County BusCounty, B.State BusState, B.Zip BusZip, B.Phone BusPhone, CC.Notes AS Notes, B.CITY_CODE BusCityCode, B.COUNTY_CODE BusCountyCode, B.STATE_CODE BusStateCode FROM USMC.ContactCard CC INNER JOIN USMC.ContactCardAddress B ON B.ID = CC.BusinessAddressID WHERE CC.ContactCardId = @ContactCardId
END
